name: ampliseq-16s-microbiome
title: Ampliseq: 16S rRNA Microbiome Profiling
description: 16S rRNA amplicon sequencing analysis for bacterial/archaeal community profiling. DADA2 ASV calling, taxonomy assignment, diversity analysis. Standard for microbiome studies. Samplesheet format: `sampleID,forwardReads,reverseReads`
content:
Ampliseq: 16S Microbiome

Gold-standard 16S rRNA gene amplicon sequencing for bacterial microbiome profiling. Uses DADA2 for ASV (Amplicon Sequence Variant) calling with single-nucleotide resolution.

Applications

  • Human Microbiome: Gut (V3-V4), oral, skin
  • Disease Association: IBD, obesity, autism
  • Clinical Trials: Probiotic efficacy
  • Environmental: Soil, water communities

Key Outputs

  • ASV Table: Feature counts per sample
  • Taxonomy: Silva/GTDB classification
  • Diversity: Alpha (Shannon, Chao1), Beta (Bray-Curtis)
  • PCoA Plots: Sample clustering

Perfect for: Bacterial microbiome • 16S amplicon • Community profiling • Clinical microbiome studies
